docstrings:
* Predicate to test whether request path matches some regex and corresponds to some conditions.
 * @since 0.23

* Anaconda client performs requests of the following formats: * /t/ol-4ee312d8-9fe2-44d2-bea9-053325e1ffd5/my-conda/noarch/repodata.json * Where second part is user token, third is repository/user name depending on the layout, * then follows conda repository architecture (for example: noarch, linux-64, win-64 etc). * This {@link Predicate} implementation tests whether path is such conda path.
